texto: The pedestals will be rolled out by the client to their programme after field trials. Support may be needed for the first installations while customer staff are gaining familiarity with the systems. 12 Special processes There are no special processes in this project. 13 Configuration management Document identifiers shall conform to the version of the Quality Manual in place at the start of the project, except for those documents already identified beforehand. Current company approved configuration management tools shall be used. 14 Customer property Any equipment belonging to the client must be so identified while in the company or its subcontractors' possession.
